data.description: Requisition Number: 215184Job Description Cintas is currently looking for an IT Intern Engineer for the Operational Technology team. The Operational Technology team works on systems primarily associated with the Rental production floor. This position will have the opportunity to work closely with functional analysts and software engineers developing, understanding requirement changes, unit and system testing, cross impact evaluation, and providing support for the applications. The applicant must communicate effectively with business and IT partners and have an aptitude to learn and understand Cintas business processes. Role: Work with functional analysts and software engineers to architect, develop, test, and deploy software solutions in support of Cintas’ customer-facing applications Learn and understand how critical production processes are automated via Operational Technology applications Work with and present to multiple levels of management your assignments and developed solutions Opportunities: Participates in projects and basic programming, and writing code Work under the technical direction of more experienced engineers Resolve programming issues Support day-to-day troubleshooting Conducts unit testing and /or integration testing of application modules to ensure application meets specifications. Skills/Qualifications Requirements: Currently enrolled in an associate's, bachelor's or master's degree program in computer science, information systems Strong understanding of Microsoft Office suite (Word, PowerPoint, Excel, Outlook, Teams, etc.) Preferred: Experience with relational database knowledge (e.g. MSSQL) Experience with .net programming development (e.g. C#, ASP.net) Experience developing system and software requirements and design Experience working with common scripting languages (ex: Javascript, Powershell) Experience with configuration management tools (Git, JIRA) Experience with client/server environment knowledge Strong verbal and written communication skills along with a strong work ethic Our partners enjoy: Competitive Pay Flexible Work Environment Career Development Opportunities Cintas Corporation is an EEO/Affirmative Action Employer M/F/D/V Company InformationCintas Corporation helps more than one million businesses of all types and sizes get Ready™ to open their doors with confidence every day by providing products and services that help keep their customers’ facilities and employees clean, safe, and looking their best. With offerings including uniforms, mats, mops, towels, restroom supplies, workplace water services, first aid and safety products, eye-wash stations, safety training, fire extinguishers, sprinkler systems and alarm service, Cintas helps customers get Ready for the Workday®. Headquartered in the U.S., Cincinnati, OH, Cintas is a publicly held Fortune 500 company traded over the Nasdaq Global Select Market under the symbol CTAS and is a component of both the Standard & Poor’s 500 Index and Nasdaq-100 Index. Cintas Corporation is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy), national origin, age, genetic information, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic or category protected by local, state, or federal law. This job posting will remain open for at least five (5) days. Job Category: Office AdministrationOrganization: CorporateEmployee Status: TemporarySchedule: Full TimeShift: 1st Shift
